item.title: [614] givemod, admin, glich [614]
item.dc:creator: @loled2 loled2
item.description:
@loled2 wrote:

[quote=“madgamer, post:2, topic:375896”][code]p.setRights((byte) 2);

p.setRights((byte) 1);[/code]

Both of these are referencing back to the player who issued the command, not the one who specified in the command text. Change both of these to p2.setRights instead.[/quote]
thank you so much!
btw stupit of me needed to look to " + p2.getUsername() + "…

cant rep++ but i want…

item.title: [614] givemod, admin, glich [614]
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

[code]p.setRights((byte) 2);

p.setRights((byte) 1);[/code]

Both of these are referencing back to the player who issued the command, not the one who specified in the command text. Change both of these to p2.setRights instead.

Read full topic

item.title: [614] givemod, admin, glich [614]
item.dc:creator: @loled2 loled2
item.description:
@loled2 wrote:

i have some stuff idk how to fix
btw no errors

give mod, admin:

if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin")) { if(p.getUsername().equals("owner name") && p.getUsername().equals("") && p.getUsername().equals("")); Player p2 = World.getPlayers().get(World.getIdFromName(cmd[1])); p.setRights((byte) 2); p.getFrames().sendChatMessage(0, "Your have made " + p2.getUsername() + " Administrator!."); } if (cmd[0].equals("givemod")) { if(p.getUsername().equals("owner name") && p.getUsername().equals("") && p.getUsername().equals("")); Player p2 = World.getPlayers().get(World.getIdFromName(cmd[1])); p.setRights((byte) 1); p.getFrames().sendChatMessage(0, "Your have made " + p2.getUsername() + " Moderator!."); }
it only make me mod, admin not like `givemod test he is mod…
